UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Activity of Gut-Derived Nisin-like Lantibiotics against Human Gut Pathogens and Commensals.
Literature.Author: Zhang ZJ, Wu C, Moreira R, Dorantes D, Pappas T, Sundararajan A, Lin H, Pamer EG, van der Donk WA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis SK135(MIC=15µM),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=15µM),Clostridioides difficile VPI 10463(MIC=10µM),Anaerostipes hadrus MSK.14.23(MIC=0.5µM),Blautia obeum MSK.18.40(MIC=0.1µM),Blautia luti MSK.20.18(MIC=0.1µM),Thomasclavelia ramosa MSK.23.96(MIC=1µM),Dorea formicigenerans MSK.17.61(MIC=0.01µM),Coprococcus comes MSK.11.23(MIC=1µM),Coprococcus eutactus MSK.18.32(MIC=0.5µM),Faecalicatena fissicatena MSK.9.3(MIC=0.1µM)
